MS MCQs

    Set up assembly management in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. How can you set up Business Central to use default locations for assembly orders when you manually create them?

      You need to set up the Assembly Default Location field on the Inventory Setup page.

      You need to set up the Default Location for Orders field on the Assembly Setup page.

      Location will be managed by related Sales Order line.

      This set up is not possible and you need to select location for each Assembly Order.


    2. If you want to use bins in assembly area where components are placed by default before they can be consumed in the assembly process, you need to make which of the following configurations?

      Select the Bin Mandatory field on the Warehouse FastTab in Assembly Setup page.

      Select Require Pick and Require Put-away fields on the Warehouse FastTab in Assembly Setup page.

      Select Require Pick and Require Put-away fields on the Warehouse FastTab in Location Card.

      Select Bin Mandatory field on the Warehouse FastTab in Location Card.


    3. How you can set up Business Central to use default locations for assembly orders that are automatically created from sales orders?

      You need to set up the Assembly Default Location field on the Inventory Setup page.

      You need to set up the Default Location for Orders field on the Assembly Setup page.

      Location is managed by the related Sales Order line.

      This set up is not possible and you need to select a location for each Assembly Order.
